alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson, northern Madison, southwestern Lowndes and southeastern Brooks Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 254 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Park to near Monticello. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, I-75 At Exit 5, Lovett, Nankin, Twin Lakes, Empress, Clyattville, Cherry Lake, Hamburg, Hanson, Pinetta and Ashville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
